caption:
Table 1. Performance comparison between TAR and TURN [2] on THUMOS-14 test 
set. Same unit feature (flow-16) and test sliding windows are used on TAR and TURN 
for fair comparison. Average Recall (AR) at different numbers is reported.

Table 2. Complementary filtering evaluation on THUMOS-14 test set, compared with 
"Union" and "tIoU-selection". Average Recall (AR) at different numbers is reported.

Table 4. For sliding 
window proposals, we observe that TAR's prediction (SW-TAR) achieves 18.29% 
and 6.86% improvement in AR@100 and AUC compared to those of TURN
